metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5295 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In PoDoFo 0.9.5, there is an integer overflow in the PdfXRefStreamParserObject::ParseStream function (base/PdfXRefStreamParserObject.cpp). Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
